ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] L30, now what?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The island across from gargoyles. He is a semi rare spawn. ... Bring a druid and use Harmony. We got most everything we ever wanted from the WC camps for
ygData.messageBody:
> For the Harvester, I need a shadowed knife, which is from a goblin in OOT
> rather than a shadowed man. Where in OOT can I find the goblin
> headmaster? Is he soloable at 30?


The island across from gargoyles. He is a semi rare spawn.


> Any thoughts on shadow men? Do all the items drop randomly off all the
> shadow men, or are there better places than others to find the shadowed
> scythe and eye/hand/mask of shadow. Are there any camps that are
> soloable or takable by a pair/trio, or will I need a full group?


Bring a druid and use Harmony. We got most everything we ever wanted from the
WC camps for all our friends this way. We also did the SK ones a bit. The
clerics suck - I hate healers, the necros do like to use fear but arent too
bad. The tanks are wimps. A good druid can single pull that camp all day
long. A bad druid will get you killed. Shadowmen are faster than SoW if you
were not aware.

Sorry cant help much on the 30 hunting grounds. My personal necro is 20 and
my main druid is 50 so I am not sure where to send you...
